amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to direct the Army Corps to expedite and complete dredging in Plymouth Harbor, Massachusetts as authorized.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Keating.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
